titleInfo.title: Somerset County Fair with Jimmy Martin and Tommy Cash

mods.abstract: One color window card (split fountain, red to black, on white) announcing Jimmy Martin, the Sunny Mountain Boys, the Tommy Cash Show, Tommy Cash and band, Don and Carla, and Stringbean at the Somerset County Fair on August 26. Poster features metal photoplates of Jimmy Martin, Tommy Cash and String Bean.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
